Action Reference
Guides
Areas
On this page
Areas
Creating Areas in Game
â€‹
If you're in game, you can choose the "Create Area" button on Area fields, or right click any text box and press "Create Area" to select an area inside the game itself.
Other Ways
â€‹
Use a tool like
https://explv.github.io/
to find coordinates and create areas. You can copy the generated area and click inside of an Area field for it to automatically format it.
You can manually make areas using two tile corners (to make a rectangular area) like this:
x, y, x, y
or if it's not on the ground floor you can use
(x, y, z), (x, y, z)
instead.
You can also create polygon areas by using the same format as above, but continue adding corners.
Multiple Areas
â€‹
You can also use multiple areas in your filters by separating the areas with a ':'. This also works with the Walk to area action, and will walk towards the closest area to your player.
Previous
Variable Panel
Next
